items.name: findmysuitcase-id
items.caption: Find My Suitcase ID
items.help: Pleace here the ID which to use as well in the findmysuitcase demo page

items.name: flightbooking-id
items.caption: Flightbooking ID
items.help: Pleace here the ID of the Flight booking demo page

items.name: apn
items.caption: APN
items.help: please set here the APN related to your SIM card and operator

items.name: force-2g
items.caption: Force 2G only
items.help: Only 2G will be selectable by the modem

items.name: google-mqtt-server
items.caption: Google MQTT Server
items.help: google MQTT server FQND

items.name: google-mqtt-server-port
items.caption: Google MQTT Server Port
items.help: google MQTT server Port Nr

items.name: use-cert
items.caption: Use Certificate
items.help: Checked if TLS shall be used

items.name: google-project
items.caption: Google project ID
items.help: place here the project ID of the Google IoT Core MQTT broker

items.name: google-regions
items.caption: Google region
items.help: Google region of MQTT Server project

items.name: google-iotcore-registry
items.caption: Google IoT Core Registry Name
items.help: place here the registry name of the MQTT IoT core service

items.name: googleIoTClientID
items.caption: Google IoT Core Client ID
items.help: place here the client ID registered to Google IoT Core

items.name: google-certificate
items.caption: Google Certificate
items.help: Please place here the google MQTT server public certificate

items.name: google-client-priv-key
items.caption: Google MQTT Client private key
items.help: Please place here the google MQTT private key part where the public part was configured to google cloud client managment before

items.name: mqtt-keep-alive
items.caption: MQTT Keep Alive
items.help: How long the server should keep the connection open without closeing

items.name: event-loop-size
items.caption: Event loop size
items.help: A counter increased with the delay of - Event cycle step delay

items.name: ping-steps
items.caption: Steps where Ping is executed
items.help: Coma separted events the ping should be executed (-1 disables the schedule)

items.name: gnss-steps
items.caption: Steps where GNSS is executed
items.help: Coma separted list where GNSS should be executed (-1 disables the schedule)

items.name: mqtt-pos-push-steps
items.caption: Steps MQTT Position pushed to cloud
items.help: Steps where the position is pushed to cloud (-1 disables the schedule)

items.name: event-cycle-step-delay
items.caption: Event cycle step delay
items.help: Time between single event steps in ms, ever spte the event loop is increased up to it's event-loop-size

items.name: fake-flightmode
items.caption: Fake flightmode
items.help: Flight mode requres a long time to recover

items.name: ksleep-mode
items.caption: KSLEEP Mode
items.help: KSLEEP mode which will be used for operation

items.name: ksslcrypto-setting
items.caption: +KSSLCRYPTO setting
items.help: This needs to be adopted to the module

items.name: ksslcrypto-profile
items.caption: Crypto - Profile
items.help: This needs to be adopted to the module and to the used +KSSLCRYPTO setting

items.name: gnssstart-timeout
items.caption: GNSSTART timeout
items.help: After this timeout the GNSS poll is considered as failed
